episodes.title: Narcissistic Abuse And Cults with Vanessa M. Reiser LCSW
episodes.description:
#narcissisticabuse #cults #therapist 

Today my guest is Vanessa M. Reiser, author of the book, “Narcissistic Abuse, A Tharapist’s Guide To Identifying, Escaping, And Healing From Toxic And Manipualtive People.” 

https://www.amazon.com/Narcissistic-Abuse-Therapists-Identifying-Manipulative/dp/0306833174

I had a great conversation with Vanessa where we talked about cults, narcissistic abuse, tips for therapists, and much more!!

episodes.title: How Cults Love Bomb, Devalue, And Discard!
episodes.description:
This is a segment from my interview with Naomi Van Winkle. She grew up in cult in Connecticut, and she has a podcast by the same name!
